name: P0lar0id
description:
Objective:

Get to the end! (Good luck)

Controls

Escape to restart

Left, right, up arrow keys to move and jump

Left click to take a picture of an object

Right-click to throw polaroid of the object and spawn it

mouse scroll wheel to zoom in and out

Credits

music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ (8-BIT surf)

Developers

Daniel Duato

Rabten Tsering
